about_the_game:
Embark on an otherworldly investigation in "Space Detective: The Case of the Rebel Robot"! Tragedy strikes at The Diogenes Science Station as Dr. Helga Steiner, the Chief Science Officer, meets an untimely end in the DNA Lab. Suspecting a deeper conspiracy, the Astral Federation calls upon Captain Sophia van Buren and her adept crew to uncover the truth. Navigate through the enigmatic corridors, interrogate the crew, and decipher the space station's encrypted files to reveal the chilling reality—a meticulously planned murder, not a mere accident. Grab your detective hat, traverse the cosmic frontier, and bring justice to this orbital science station. The fate of the galaxy hinges on your investigative prowess. Can you unveil the secrets before the rebel robot strikes again? The cosmic clock is ticking, Detective.



  • A juicy Sci-Fi Mystery Storyline
  • 3 different endings influenced by who you accuse as the perpetrator
  • 3 different romanceable women
  • Cool Elctropop and Synthwave Soundtrack
  • Anime style character art

content_descriptors.notes: There is talk about romantic relationships, infidelity and the main protagonist can go on dates after the detective mystery aspect of the game is finished.
